name: Utgarda Loki, the Skeletal Giant
text:
Break: Put this card into your hand.
While this card is a sumon spell, players cannot chase cards with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: This card cannot be targeted by spells with total cost 4 or less or abilities on a card with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: At the end of your recovery phase, pay BB2 or put this card on the bottom of your main deck.
Continuous: As long as this card is in your field, each resonator in your opponent's field attacks if able.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
